name: molester
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who molests (= sexually attacks) someone, especially a child: a child molester Neighbours suspected him of being a molester. See
molest
More examplesFewer examplesThe judge sentenced the child molester to life plus 110 years in prison.52 percent of the molesters eventually faced another sex-crimes charge. The younger the victim, the likelier that the molester was also a juvenile.
